page.title: 08Anstey Park, Alton
page.content: Just out of Alton near Holybourne there is a park called{Anstey Park. } In the park there are several{clubs : a{cricket}club, a{football}club, a {rugby}club and a{squash}club. The squash club is called{Cromwells}and you can play{snooker}there as well as squash. Outside Cromwells there is a {playground}where lots of people go to play on the slides and climbing frames. Near the playground there is a scout hut where{cubs and scouts} meet. Anstey Park is a nice place for walks and lots of people go there with their dogs. Anstey Park is also used from time to time for{Carnivals and Fairs.
